Title: Radio Days
Actors: Mike Starr, Paul Herman, Don Pardo, Martin Rosenblatt
Plot: Woody Allen's sentimental reminiscence about the golden age of radio. A series of vignettes involving radio personalities is intertwined with the life of a working class family in Rockaway Beach, NY circa 1942.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 8 nominations.
